alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 1:52AM CDT until March 25 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bradley County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Western Polk County in east Tennessee... Southwestern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 AM EDT. * At 251 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chattanooga, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Lakesite, Charleston, South Cleveland, Harrison, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake and Collegedale. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 3 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
